finnish.title: Stick with It
finnish.Question1: To compare is to associate two or more similar persons, ideas, or situations. Can you discover any comparisons made by the author of this story? Why do you think that the author would have made this comparison?
finnish.Question2: To contrast is to put side by side two or more distinct persons, ideas, or situations. Can you discover any contrasts made by the author of this story? Why do you think that the author would have made this contrast?
finnish.Question3: Take time to note any repeated words or concepts you have found in this story.
finnish.Question4: Please take time to write a short prayer to God responding to what you have discovered through these comparisons, contrasts and repetitions.
